DataElement.preferredDefinition: the highest level of person's education.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the highest level of person's education.

Concepts.definition: A human being.

Property.preferredDefinition: Approaching or constituting a maximum; the highest point (of something).:The activities of educating or instructing or teaching; activities that impart knowledge or skill.

Concepts.definition: Approaching or constituting a maximum; the highest point (of something).
The activities of educating or instructing or teaching; activities that impart knowledge or skill.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the highest level of education for the patient._Approaching or constituting a maximum; the highest point (of something)._A demographic parameter indicating the number of years of schooling or the highest level of achievement at school.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Professional Doctorate Degree Completion Or Academic Doctorate Degree Completion

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Professional Doctorate Degree Completion Or Academic Doctorate Degree Completion
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a person has received a degree allowing them to practice a profession, such as law, medicine, music, or ministry.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Indicates that a person has received a degree the highest award earned for graduate study.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a person has received a degree allowing them to practice a profession, such as law, medicine, music, or ministry.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Indicates that a person has received a degree for completion of the highest award earned for graduate study.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a person has received a degree for completion of at least one year of prescribed study beyond the bachelor's degree.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a person has received a degree for completion of at least one year of prescribed study beyond the bachelor's degree.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a person has attended college but that they did not receive any degree.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a person has attended college but that they did not receive any degree.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: 8th Grade Completion To 11th Grade Completion Not High School Graduate

ValueMeaning.preferredName: 8th Grade Completion To 11th Grade Completion Not High School Graduate
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that 8th grade is the highest level of educational achievement.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: Indicates that 11th grade is the highest level of educational achievement.: Indicates a person has attended high school but did not complete high school and did not receive a high school diploma.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that 8th grade is the highest level of educational achievement.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
Indicates that 11th grade is the highest level of educational achievement.
Indicates a person has attended high school but did not complete high school and did not receive a high school diploma.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: Indicates that 8th grade is the highest level of educational achievement.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
Indicates that 8th grade is the highest level of educational achievement.

Bachelor's degree is an award (baccalaureate or equivalent degree, as determined by the Secretary of the U.S. Department of Education) conferred by a college, university, or other postsecondary education institution as official recognition for the successful completion of a program of studies, that normally requires at least four years of full-time equivalent college-level work. This includes bachelor's degrees conferred in a five-year cooperative program.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: General Equivalency Diploma Completion Or High School Completion

ValueMeaning.preferredName: General Equivalency Diploma Completion Or High School Completion
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a person has received a General Equivalency Diploma in lieu of a high school diploma.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Indicates that a person has attended high school and has received a high school diploma.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a person has received a General Equivalency Diploma in lieu of a high school diploma.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Indicates that a person has attended high school and has received a high school diploma.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a person has attended or received a degree from an occupational, technical, or vocational program as their highest level of educational achievement.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a person has attended or received a degree from an occupational, technical, or vocational program as their highest level of educational achievement.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Approaching or constituting a maximum; the highest point (of something).:A demographic parameter indicating the number of years of schooling or the highest level of achievement at school.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: Approaching or constituting a maximum; the highest point (of something).
An indication of the years of schooling completed in graded public, private, or parochial schools, and in colleges, universities, or professional schools.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
